title: Augment cases disappeared
body:
Hello, I bought yesterday a bundle 10+1 new project cases, I started to opening them and when I had 3 cases left I couldn't open more, so I thought that there is something like day limit (10 cases per day) and I logged it today and I have no cases left.. Can someone explain me what exactly happened and what should I do know, since It looks like a just lost money on RP. 
Looking forward to hearing from you.
xx

replies.body:
Hey Lee,

I took a look at your account and  it looks like you opened all 12 of your Augment Caches successfully. If you're not able to see the content from these chests, please let me know.
